mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, CATEGORY_CLASS1 AS categoryClass1, CATEGORY_CLASS2 AS categoryClass2, CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION AS categoryDescription, CATEGORY_ORDER AS categoryOrder FROM BOARD_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDER

SELECT CATEGORY_ID AS categoryId, CATEGORY_CLASS1 AS categoryClass1, CATEGORY_CLASS2 AS categoryClass2, CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION AS categoryDescription, CATEGORY_ORDER AS categoryOrder FROM BOARD_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_CLASS1=#{class1} ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_CATEGORY (CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_CLASS1, CATEGORY_CLASS2, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, CATEGORY_ORDER) VALUES (SEQ_BOARD_CATEGORY_ID.NEXTVAL, #{categoryClass1}, #{categoryClass2}, #{categoryName}, #{categoryDescription}, #{categoryOrder})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_CLASS1 = #{categoryClass1}, CATEGORY_CLASS2 = #{categoryClass2}, CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName}, CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION = #{categoryDescription}, CATEGORY_ORDER = #{categoryOrder} WHERE categoryId = #{categoryId}
